class.name: kr_serial_interface/QuadEncodeMsg
class.description: This packs the data being sent to the quad into a nice efficient byte-stream.

class.name: kr_serial_interface/QuadDecodeMsg
class.description: This unpacks the data being sent from the quad into a ROS message.

class.name: kr_serial_interface/QuadSerialComm
class.description: This sends the packed data over the serial port. It also receives data from the quad and unpacks the payload from the received packet.
